# Turf Cleaning Las Vegas

> Professional artificial turf cleaning services in Las Vegas, Nevada. Pet odor removal, deep cleaning, and maintenance for residential and commercial properties.

## Business Info

- Name: Turf Cleaning Las Vegas
- Phone: (702) 819-7749
- Email: info@turfcleaninglasvegas.com
- Website: https://turfcleaninglasvegas.com
- Address: Las Vegas, NV
- Hours: Mon-Fri 7am-7pm, Sat 8am-5pm, Sun by appointment
- Emergency service available 7 days a week

## Services & Pricing

### Refresh Clean (from $299)
Basic maintenance cleaning perfect for regular upkeep of your artificial turf.
- Debris & leaf removal
- Surface brushing
- Weed removal
- Visual inspection
- Turf decompacting

### Restore Clean (from $399) - Most Popular
Deep cleaning with odor treatment. Ideal for pet owners and high-traffic areas.
- Everything in Refresh
- Pet waste removal
- Odor elimination treatment
- Sanitizing application
- Infill redistribution
- Power brushing

### Deep Clean (from $699)
Complete restoration for neglected turf. Brings your lawn back to like-new condition.
- Everything in Restore
- Pressure washing
- Stain removal treatment
- Urine extraction
- Full infill replenishment
- Drainage optimization
- Edge repair inspection

### Additional Services
- Monthly Maintenance Plan (save 20%)
- Commercial Turf Cleaning (custom quote)
- Emergency Pet Cleanup (same-day)

## Key Features
- Locally owned & operated in Las Vegas
- 100% pet-safe, eco-friendly, non-toxic products
- Same-day service available
- Satisfaction guarantee on every job
- Licensed & insured
- No travel fees within the Las Vegas Valley
- Desert climate specialists

## Frequently Asked Questions

### How much does turf cleaning cost?
Our services start at $299 for a basic Refresh Clean. Restore Clean starts at $399, and Deep Clean starts at $699. Final pricing depends on turf area size. We provide free, no-obligation quotes.

### How long does the cleaning take?
Most residential cleanings are completed in 1-2 hours. Larger properties or deep cleaning services may take longer.

### Is the cleaning safe for my pets?
Yes, all our products are 100% non-toxic and pet-safe. Pets can return to the turf as soon as it dries, typically within 30-60 minutes.

### Do you offer recurring service plans?
Yes, we offer monthly, bi-monthly, and quarterly maintenance plans at discounted rates. Regular cleaning extends the life of your turf and keeps odors at bay.

### What if the odor comes back?
We stand behind our work with a satisfaction guarantee. If you are not satisfied, we will come back to retreat at no additional charge.

### Do you charge travel fees?
No. All communities within the Las Vegas Valley are covered with zero travel fees or surcharges.

## About Us
Turf Cleaning Las Vegas was born from the growing need for specialized artificial turf cleaning services in the desert climate. As pet owners ourselves, we developed a professional cleaning process specifically designed for the Las Vegas climate, where extreme heat, dust storms, and UV exposure create unique challenges for artificial turf maintenance.
